dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Lali-you'll never believe this-ho, Forename! Something's arrived at the village for you─from Konogg.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: It looks to be some kind of technological whatsit─see this gold pattern here? Haven't the faintest how you'd read it, though.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: This portable archive the siblings built should do the trick.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I have just the thingamabob for the job.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Huh, so you just wave this “archive” at it? Well, there you go. Feel free to check it at your leisure.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: You know, might be as Konogg's up and left the village, but the fact that he's still keeping in touch... It gives me hope that he hasn't given up on us yet.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: So I'll keep doing what I can. I'll keep working to change this village into a place that Konogg would want to return to.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: We've got lots of mountains to climb and it's going to take a lot of time. But bit by bit and with your help, I'm sure we'll get there.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a message from Konogg.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The message can be viewed in your Portable Archive, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.

obj.n: Komra Wasn't Built in a Day
